description: This trap indicates that a call signaling port is opened.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipCallSigPortOpenNotification SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortNum i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: IP Address of the Sip Signalling Port - mandatory parameter
variables.name: SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortIpAddress

description: UDP port number of SIP Signalling Port (default is 5060).
variables.name: SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortNum

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a call signaling port is closed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipCallSigPortCloseNotification SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortNum i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: IP Address of the Sip Signalling Port - mandatory parameter
variables.name: SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortIpAddress

description: UDP port number of SIP Signalling Port (default is 5060).
variables.name: SONUS-SIP-SIGNALLING-MIB::sonusSipSigPortNum

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
